drupalNodeEvent.title: Book Talk – Greening East Asia: The Rise of the Eco-developmental State

field_organizers.processed: Centre for Chinese Research, Centre for Japanese Research, Centre for Korean Research, Institute of Asian Research, University of British Columbia

field_description.processed: On December 10 at 5PM (PST), join the online book talk hosted collaboratively by UBC’s Centre for Chinese Research, Centre for Japanese Research, and Centre for Korean Research. The event will feature the authors and contributors of a newly published book—Greening East Asia: The Rise of the Eco-developmental State, edited by Ashley Esarey, Mary Alice Haddad, Joanna I. Lewis and Stevan Harrell. We will take a look into the regional shift in East Asia from development to “Eco-Development.” Opening remarks by CCR and IAR director Tim Cheek and CJR Co-director Yves Tiberghien.
